meanings.definition: A piece of stiff paper or thin cardboard, typically rectangular, with writing or pictures on it.
meanings.sent1: I wrote a message on the cards for my friends.
meanings.sent2: She collected cards with beautiful pictures on them.
meanings.sent3: The cards with funny jokes made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a deck of colorful cards, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used flashcards to help us learn new words.

meanings.sent1: He drew a cards from the deck and won the game.
meanings.sent2: We played a game of poker with a deck of cards.
meanings.sent3: The magician made the cards disappear and reappear.
meanings.sent4: Her strategy was like a well-played card in a game of chance.
meanings.sent5: The joker card always made everyone laugh during the game.

meanings.sent1: She handed out her cards at the networking event.
meanings.sent2: His name and contact details were printed on the card.
meanings.sent3: The business card was so fancy, it looked like a mini billboard.
meanings.sent4: Her business card was like a key to unlocking new opportunities.
meanings.sent5: He kept the important business cards in a special holder on his desk.
